elements.text:
Your partner was in the hospital recently and you have been helping to pay their medical bills. You wonder what this will mean for your finances moving forward.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I am terrified that we will never recover from this financially.
I'm scared about what this means for my finances, but I trust that we will figure it out.
I am confident in our plan for handling this situation.
I am thrilled that my partner is out of the hospital.
The uncertainty of this situation is uncomfortable, but I can tolerate it.
